text: Tara yakhana tadera pitara kache phire ela takhana balalah he amadera pita, amadera jan'ye khadya sasyera baradda nisid'dha kara hayeche. Ata'eba apani amadera bha'ike amadera sathe prerana karuna; yate amara khadya sasyera baradda anate pari ebam amara abasya'i tara puropuri hephayata karaba.
